Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima stayed in the shadows, near the doorway, watching these newcomers 
'pledge' their loyalty to Hydras. 

The one known as Keyra was to be watched closely. No matter what side she 
would pledge, she seemed that she couldn't be trusted. 

As a matter of fact, neither of them could be trusted until their proved 
themselves. 

When she heard the name Scatter Shot, she growled as her optics glared at the 
one called Scatter Shot. Wasn't he an Autobot... from the past? Yes... she 
remembered about what happened on Nebulos so many years ago. This one will be 
watched VERY closely. 

She growled as they left the room, then turned to the others. She waited only 
to make sure she knew who they were, why they were here & what they were 
doing. 

She watched Hydras for a moment, with the newcomers. 

--part1_41.2ba342b1.2b8e3f72_boundary
